title: Zuori Qing Kong
ending_song: "Zuori Qing Kong (昨日青空)" by Zhangjing You (尤长靖)
sinopse: In the late 90's, in China, Tu Xiaoyi, an high school student, takes no interest in marks and prefers to play video games with his friend nicknamed "Peanut." One day, he was chosen by his teacher to become the class representative with Yao Zhetian, a very cute girl. He will experience his first love and disappointments.
